mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (category, user_id, title, content, image_url) VALUES (#{category}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl});
mapper.select: SELECT b.category, b.title, u.nickname AS username, b.created_at FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id
SELECT b.category, b.title, u.nickname AS nickname, u.image_url AS profileImageUrl, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, b.content, b.image_url FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id

SELECT b.category, b.title, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id
AND (b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%'))
AND (b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%'))
AND u.nickname = #{writer}
ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
